QueryDefinition.Query:
WITH CTE_NUM_RX AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY r.ptid, r.CLMID, r.NDC, r.COPAY, r.DEDUCT, r.AVGWHLSL, r.STD_COST, r.DAYS_SUP, r.QUANTITY, r.RFL_NBR, r.NPI, r.Pat_PlanId, r.fill_dt) ROW_NUM, r.clmid, r.ptid AS PERSON_ID, r.fill_dt AS DRUG_EXPOSURE_START_DATE, r.quantity AS QUANTITY, r.days_sup AS DAYS_SUPPLY, r.ndc AS DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE, r.copay, r.std_cost, r.deduct, r.avgwhlsl, r.npi, r.rfl_nbr, r.Pat_PlanId FROM {sc}.RX_CLAIMS r JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND r.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE ) , CTE_LAST_RECORD AS ( SELECT z.* FROM CTE_NUM_RX z JOIN ( SELECT r.PERSON_ID, r.clmid, r.DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE, MAX(r.ROW_NUM) MAX_ROW_NUM FROM CTE_NUM_RX r GROUP BY r.PERSON_ID, r.clmid, r.DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE ) m ON m.PERSON_ID = z.PERSON_ID AND m.clmid = z.clmid AND m.DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE = z.DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE AND m.MAX_ROW_NUM = z.ROW_NUM ), result as ( SELECT r.PERSON_ID, r.DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE, r.DRUG_EXPOSURE_START_DATE, MAX(rfl_nbr) AS RFL_NBR, SUM(COPAY) AS PAID_COPAY, SUM(DEDUCT) AS PAID_TOWARD_DEDUCTIBLE, SUM(avgwhlsl) AS AVERAGE_WHOLESALE_PRICE, SUM(STD_COST) AS TOTAL_PAID, ROUND(SUM(QUANTITY),0) AS QUANTITY, '38000175' AS DRUG_TYPE_CONCEPT_ID, CASE WHEN SUM(DAYS_SUPPLY) < 0 THEN 0 WHEN SUM(DAYS_SUPPLY) > 365 THEN 365 WHEN SUM(DAYS_SUPPLY) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(DAYS_SUPPLY) END AS DAYS_SUPPLY, Pat_PlanId FROM CTE_LAST_RECORD r GROUP BY r.PERSON_ID, r.DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE, r.DRUG_EXPOSURE_START_DATE, r.Pat_PlanId )
select *, SUBSTRING(DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE,1,9) DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE_9, 44818668 as CurrencyConceptId, cast(replace(PERSON_ID, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, 'ses' source_type from result ORDER BY cast(replace(PERSON_ID, 'PT','') as bigint)
